00014 namespace BulletHell.Game.Object
00015 {
00016     public class EnemyBulletObj : BulletObj
00017     {
00018         int hp = 2;
00019         public EnemyBulletObj(Texture2D sprite, float x, float y, float vx, float vy, SoundEffect hitEffect,
00020             bool killable, bool bounceable, float xDirection, float yDirection)
00021             : base(sprite, x, y, vx, vy, hitEffect, killable, bounceable, xDirection, yDirection) { }
00022 
00023         internal override void Update(List<BulletObj> pool, Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00024         {
00025             if (collision(map.hero) && map.hero.visibility)
00026             {
00027                 visibility = false;
00028                 map.hero.hp--;
00029             }
00030 
00031             /* if the bullet can be killed check to see if the bullet has collide with any ofthe hero's bullet */
00032             if (killable){
00033                 foreach(BulletObj bullet in map.hero.BulletPool)
00034                     if (bullet.collision(this) && visibility && bullet.visibility)
00035                     {
00036                         hp--;
00037                         bullet.visibility = false;
00038                     }
00039             }
00040             if (hp <= 0)
00041                 visibility = false;
00042 
00043             base.Update(pool, map, gameTime);
00044         }
00045 
00046         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00047         {
00048             base.Draw(gameTime);
00049         }
00050     }
00051 }
